column6: STAND THY GROUND- FOR THIS MAY BE THE FINEST HOUR EVER FOR THE PRINCE OF POWER-HERCULES! The final chapter in Bob Layton's legendary future Hercules Saga has arrived and it's a DOOZY! The evil mastermind of the Succession Alliance: REVEALED! The final fates of Galactus, Skyppi the Skrull and Recorder: FINALIZED! The creation of a new Silver Surfer: UNVEILED! You won't want to miss this EPIC, EXPANSIVE, EXPLOSIVE conclusion to an event decades in the making (take that, SIEGE)! VERILY-IT SHALL ROCK THY WORLD HARDER THAN GALACTUS!! Rated T  ...$3.99
